name: The City
startIntroPart1: To know and manipulate all the secrets of the world; that is the privilege of the Head, Eye, and Claw. It is their honor and absolute power. No one dares to stand against them. As long as they exist, the tale of the Nest will never reach its close.
startIntroPart2: This mod was brought to you by an avid Project Moon fan - Alkalyaninth Zynth Syliantide
declaringWar: Your nation has already become a threat of the City. We could not stand by any longer
attacked: This is an ordeal to overcome, for you and for us.
introduction: You bear a poison, heavy and slow... yet deadly. I know you well, even though you know nothing about me.
neutralNo: Our apologies, but this arrangement is not sufficient for fulfilling our needs...
hateNo: We have decided to not proceed with your arrangment, for it is not faavorable...
hateYes: For now, we shall kindly accept your request...
afterPeace: I only ask that you do not wage war on us again. The City lacks time for international wars...
tradeRequest: This arrangement may indeed benefit us.
uniques: Enemy [All] units must spend [999] extra movement points when inside your territory
Cities are razed [3] times as fast
[+100]% unhappiness from the number of cities
